name: Yellow Dead Redemption
description:
In the realm where all is in reverse you are the Lord of the Dark and both death and rebirth are in your hands. Your sacrifice is needed for the new life. If you succeed to die, rebirth and revival for all will result. Your aim is to get destroyed – but you’ll find out that it’s not so easy to achieve it. The book of the Black Phoenix will provide you with strategies and you’ll use a mysterious machine.
Revival and rebirth are in your hands! You have 10 days to achieve them!
